name: punisher
description:
hi!

in this game you go around and kill violently your torturers by throwing a sawblade at them. yayyy!

expect to die and restart a lot. its ok. 

 controls:

WASD to move.

LEFT CLICK to throw

SPACE to dash in the direction you are moving  while not holding the saw.

R to restart

ESCAPE to pause.

I had a lot of fun working on this one and learned alot.

have fun!

murder is fun.

Voltaic Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
